definitions.definition: In the form of a tabloid (noun sense 2 and sense 2.3 ) : compressed or compact in size .
Resembling the style of journalism generally associated with a tabloid newspaper : appealing to unsophisticated people , sensational , etc.

main_definition: In the form of a tabloid (noun sense 2 and sense 2.3 ) : compressed or compact in size .
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) Resembling the style of journalism generally associated with a tabloid newspaper : appealing to unsophisticated people , sensational , etc.
